problem.markdown:
>>The biggest pile of inventory is just before the bottleneck. True or false?<<
[x] True, if there is only one bottleneck and buffers are infinite. [x] Possibly false, if buffers are finite. Blockages propagates, and inventory spreads out. [ ] True, because the bottleneck is the slowest machines, thus parts will accumulate infront of it. [x] Possibly false, if there is more than one. Largest inventory occurs where there is largest difference in rates of successive bottlenecks.
